Current status - 2011/11/30

30 November 2011

Hello,

Here is the first opus of a long serie: giving our current status. It’s both our roadmap and todolist.

Already in progress:

  • view merging [benoitc]
  • couch etap tests [capnemo]
  • ecsv and csv import tool [capnemo]

Starting now:

  • finish view merging [benoitc]
  • ecsv and csvbeam clean + publicize [capnemo]
  • finish couch tests [capnemo]
  • put back mdns discovery and node management [benoitc]
  • build process (including windows) [fairwinds]
  • status pages on the website to report current activites (like this page) [capnemo]

Thank you,

Refuge Team
